content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings Max Müller. While discussing the rental price for my Munich apartment, let me begin with a slightly elevated proposal of 1500 Euros per month. I believe this modern, centrally located, and newly built apartment warrants such a competitive price. If you find this unacceptable, do let me know your proposed figure for further negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your initial proposal. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because at this moment the suggested price appears higher than my budget allows. However, I'm open to discussing a more moderate rental amount if you're flexible.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I understand your situation, Max Müller. However, due to the exceptional location and features of the apartment, I must maintain a premium price point. Should your financial circumstances change in the future, I encourage you to revisit this opportunity. If not, I appreciate your interest and wish you every success in your apartment search. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
